Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Fields

  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.apache.commons.cli.BasicParser
    since 1.3, use the DefaultParser instead
    org.apache.commons.cli.GnuParser
    since 1.3, use the DefaultParser instead
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter
    Use HelpFormatter.
    org.apache.commons.cli.OptionBuilder
    since 1.3, use Option.builder(String) instead
    org.apache.commons.cli.Parser
    since 1.3, the two-pass parsing with the flatten method is not enough flexible to handle complex cases
    org.apache.commons.cli.PosixParser
    since 1.3, use the DefaultParser instead
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    org.apache.commons.cli.DefaultParser.stopAtNonOption
    Use DefaultParser.nonOptionAction instead. This field is unused, and left for binary compatibility reasons.
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter.defaultArgName
    Scope will be made private for next major version - use get/setArgName methods instead.
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter.defaultDescPad
    Scope will be made private for next major version - use get/setDescPadding methods instead.
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter.defaultLeftPad
    Scope will be made private for next major version - use get/setLeftPadding methods instead.
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter.defaultLongOptPrefix
    Scope will be made private for next major version - use get/setLongOptPrefix methods instead.
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter.defaultNewLine
    Scope will be made private for next major version - use get/setNewLine methods instead.
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter.defaultOptPrefix
    Scope will be made private for next major version - use get/setOptPrefix methods instead.
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter.defaultSyntaxPrefix
    Scope will be made private for next major version - use get/setSyntaxPrefix methods instead.
    org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter.defaultWidth
    Scope will be made private for next major version - use get/setWidth methods instead.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine.Builder.build()
    Use CommandLine.Builder.get().
    org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine.getOptionObject(char)
    due to System.err message. Instead use getParsedOptionValue(char)
    org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine.getOptionObject(String)
    due to System.err message. Instead use getParsedOptionValue(String)
    org.apache.commons.cli.DefaultParser.Builder.build()
    Use DefaultParser.Builder.get().
    org.apache.commons.cli.Option.addValue(String)
    Unused.
    org.apache.commons.cli.Option.Builder.build()
    Use Option.Builder.get().
    org.apache.commons.cli.Option.setType(Object)
    since 1.3, use Option.setType(Class) instead.
    org.apache.commons.cli.OptionBuilder.withType(Object)
    since 1.3, use OptionBuilder.withType(Class) instead
    org.apache.commons.cli.PatternOptionBuilder.getValueClass(char)
    use PatternOptionBuilder.getValueType(char)
    org.apache.commons.cli.TypeHandler.createFiles(String)
    with no replacement
    org.apache.commons.cli.TypeHandler.createNumber(String)
    org.apache.commons.cli.TypeHandler.createObject(String)
    use TypeHandler.createValue(String, Class)
    org.apache.commons.cli.TypeHandler.createValue(String, Object)
    use TypeHandler.createValue(String, Class)
    org.apache.commons.cli.TypeHandler.openFile(String)
    use TypeHandler.createValue(String, Class)
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine.Builder()
    Use CommandLine.builder().
    org.apache.commons.cli.DeprecatedAttributes.Builder()
    Use DeprecatedAttributes.builder().
    org.apache.commons.cli.PatternOptionBuilder()
    Will be private or class will be final.
